website_summaries.verdict: While it's a bit pricey, the sleek design of the Sharp i-Elegance DK-AP7N sets it apart from more mundane portable iPod speakers.
pros: Stylish, compact, portable iPod speaker sounds decent for being so small
powered by AC adapter or four AA batteries
protective covers for both the speaker and AC adapter are included

customer_reviews.title: OK But Average Sound
customer_reviews.text: I had real hopes for this system, especially given the high original retail price and glowing reviews of others (for other colors). It's OK but not great. In my opinion, the sound is not tinny but also not full. The "subwoofer" does add a little bass but it isn't real sounding bass. My small JBL ipod speaker system sounds better. I don't like that the speakers are totally exposed when open--other similar systems have something over the driver to protect it. The 3d effect works but is pretty standard for these kind of portables. Nice unadvertised feature: it works with and charges an Iphone 4g. Worth the asked price but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: favorite dock
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite docking station speaker ever! i use this at work all the time, and i have other docking stations but this one is by far the best. And for 30 bucks its a deal. its very nice how you can fold it up and just put it in your bag. it also comes with pouches if you're worried about scratching the surface. i did have a problem trying to doc my 4S while having an otterbox defender around it, but my other docking stations have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: damien davis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The sound is outstanding. I am very picky went it comes to sound quality. If it's not good I won't bother listening. Everywhere I take it people are surprised how it puts out such a great sound in a small package. It sounds better than other most expensive units I've heard before. It's easy to use and easy to carry. It includes a small carry bag for the unit and the plug. Also it protects it from getting scratched and dirty while you carrying it in your bag. If you want great sound at a low price, get your selve one of these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Has decent sound especially with the surround button activated, not real loud but it is enough to enjoy the music on the patio. Going to take it to the Philippines and enjoy it at the many resorts that we are going to visit, it is small enough to take along and it charges the I-pod while I listen. Good product at a really fair price, I would highly recommend this to anyone. Also it will accept the I-pod touch with the protective covering on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud, adapter pooped out
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing when I first got it but after about six months the adapter pooped out. Be advised that the sound is decent when used in a small and quiet room, but it doesn't get very loud without some speaker distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Arrrg!

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for size but will suck the life out of your batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few weeks ago but really just took it out for a test drive on the 4th of July. Like other reviewers have said, this sucks the life out of your batteries in a heartbeat (what do you expect from AA batteries in a sound device). The sound quality is actually quite nice for the size of this unit and spending $38 bucks on a unit that is normally over a hundred cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: great sounding system, easily portable
customer_reviews.text: This unit is small, looks good and sounds very good. I looked at and listened to a lot of various small speakers this is the best combination I've found for portability and price. Sounds very good.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Perfect for camping. I have it set up in my bathroom and it is plenty loud enough over the shower and fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for value
customer_reviews.text: This is a small compact docking station. The sound quality is excellant. It is fairly simple to use. We wish it came more ways to use it. It does as advertised but we feel like it might have more uses. The instruction pamphlet is straight forward but brief. We love that it can be used to charge the iPhone too. It's a great little product. We were blown away by the sound quality. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: sdcevans502

customer_reviews.title: Like a tin can
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and boy are they all wrong - it sounded no better than the iPhone itself except that it sounded like the iPhone was inside a tin can. Awful - sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Davy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this speaker set! piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: As the person who also gave this system 1 star, he/she is dead on point. I put new batteries in it and it still cuts out after just 10 minutes of playing. It killed my batteries overnight while the system was off. Plugged in, it works perfectly. Other than that, it is a $60 paperweight. I don't understand how this thing could have cost $130 brand new???!!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: jreabold311

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: great sound for the money. ipods fit to the connector was a little sloppy. overall great buy for the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in NV

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I received this speaker a couple weeks ago, it came faster than i thought. The sounds is great, $35 for this thing is just worth it since i don't really have enough money to buy a "expensive" one. I wish it would be louder but that's ok because you get for what you paid. I'm satisfy and I hope that everybody would make a right choice, like me :D
customer_reviews.author: Khoi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This sounds very clear and works well. It's not superbass but it sounds excellent! Definitely worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: big sound, small space
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight, great sound, 6 hours use away from charger....great little carrying case prevents the kids from scratching it up
customer_reviews.author: Lori Patchen

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted something portable to use with her IPOD and this works great. Pretty good sound as long as your not blasting it. Small compact size with decent sound. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: joyzkim

customer_reviews.title: Sharp i-elegance music System for ipod and mp3
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and it charges the ipod when plugged in. Also runs on batteries. Great to take on vacation. Nice carry case also.
customer_reviews.author: cody03

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Generally speaking, I love the Sharp product. This is an excellent speaker with great sound quality for a decent sized room or office. Also very portable. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: paulv1160

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had these speakers for over 3 months now, I used them for my office and they have great sound, not as loud as the Sonic Impact 5084 (which also have amazing sound, but the iPod connector came loose and speakers started to create lots of noise). The Sharp i-Elegance is nice for a small environment, you're not going to host a huge party with these, but if you just want relaxing music in your office/home and looking for quality sound these are it, I also travel alot and these speakers serve me great because I can also plug them into a 220vlts outlet, and there are not bulky, they come with carrying bags for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: W. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: nice little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a set of speakers for portability around the house, by the pool and camping. It charges,and plays with batteries or frm the outlet. We use it as a set of speaker to watch movies outside in the summer with a LCD projector and is good for just the family. Not enough volume for big crowds or party moving watching while other activity going on. The design is great for storage protection as we take it camping to listen to music. The front flips up and down to protect the speakers with storage. Great for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT MLKVY

customer_reviews.title: the new world
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to the new world! i have been an audiophile for over forty years, and have seen many things come and go. this product is the most highly defined and practical system ever. it has both real bass and high definition sound. simply awesome!
customer_reviews.author: todd reece

customer_reviews.title: Great Image
customer_reviews.text: It seems to me that it is a good system with good sound quality and great image. I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Sabal

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for my new Verizon iPhone 4 and it works awesome. Sound is great for a small system. Very happy and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O`Malley

product_meta.title: Sharp i-Elegance Music System for iPod and MP3 Players (High Gloss White/Black)
product_meta.description: Color:White / BlackThe Sharp i-Elegance series introduces a docking system for iPod players and or MP3/WMA portable digital personal players. When using an iPod player the user can play music directly from the device and recharge the unit when plugged into an AC outlet or for music on-the-go via 4 AA batteries. This small, yet powerful, 2.1 channel audio system features an ultra-portable design that folds closed for safe keeping when on the go. The single system houses all the necessary components for an enjoyable listening experience, including the main drivers and subwoofer. With six hours of battery operation and an AC adapter and soft carry bag included, the DKAP7N is truly a portable solution to enjoying high-quality audio from any location. The DKAP7N also includes a video output jack so that when connected to a TV, users can enjoy their favorite videos on a larger screen. Additionally, the user has an option to connect their laptop or portable MP3 player via Auxiliary-in terminal. Compatible with the following iPod Players: iPod nano 1st / 2nd / 3rd / 4th Generation, iPod mini, iPod 4th / 5th Generation, iPod classic, iPod Touch 1st / 2nd Generation
feature_bullets: Sharp DKAP7N i-Elegance Music System High Gloss White / Black

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars40 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
